title: It actually super triggers me whenever people call the Raptors "Wraiths"
body:
Yes, they were called that for four years. It's been three years since they've been changed. Are you still going to be living in the past and calling them "wraiths" after six years have passed? 

I know habits are a thing, but it does -not- take that much effort to call them by their new names, good god.
